tool_description:
Returns Harvey Specter random quotes.
/harvey to get one random quote
/harvey/N  to get N quotes
name: HarveyAPI
title: HarveyAPI

api_list.name: /harvey/N
api_list.description: Returns N number of random  quotes

api_list.name: /harvey
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harveyapi.p.rapidapi.com/harvey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harveyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://harveyapi.p.rapidapi.com/harvey"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harveyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
